      • MongoWrapper

        public MongoWrapper(String connectionString)
        Constructs a new MongoWrapper with the provided connection string.

    • Method Detail

      • insertDocument

        public CompletableFuture<Void> insertDocument(String databaseName,
                                              String collectionName,
                                              org.bson.Document document)
        Inserts a document into the specified collection asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the database
        collectionName - the name of the collection
        document - the document to insert
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture that completes when the document is inserted. May encounter an exception if the database or collection doesn't exist.

      • findDocuments

        public CompletableFuture<com.mongodb.client.FindIterable<org.bson.Document>> findDocuments(String databaseName,
                                                                                           String collectionName,
                                                                                           String fieldName,
                                                                                           Object value)
        Finds documents in the specified collection based on a field and its value asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the database
        collectionName - the name of the collection
        fieldName - the name of the field to search
        value - the value to search for in the field
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture containing a FindIterable of matching documents. May return null if the database, collection, or field is null or if an exception occurs during execution.

      • getFieldValue

        public CompletableFuture<Object> getFieldValue(String databaseName,
                                               String collectionName,
                                               String fieldName,
                                               Object value,
                                               String fieldToGet)
        Retrieves a specific field value from a document in the specified collection asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the database
        collectionName - the name of the collection
        fieldName - the name of the field to search
        value - the value to search for in the field
        fieldToGet - the name of the field to retrieve
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture containing the value of the specified field. May return null if the document, field, or database doesn't exist, or if an exception occurs during execution.

      • setFieldValue

        public CompletableFuture<Void> setFieldValue(String databaseName,
                                             String collectionName,
                                             String fieldName,
                                             Object value,
                                             String fieldToSet,
                                             Object newValue)
        Sets a specific field value in a document in the specified collection asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the database
        collectionName - the name of the collection
        fieldName - the name of the field to search
        value - the value to search for in the field
        fieldToSet - the name of the field to update
        newValue - the new value to set for the field
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture that completes when the field is updated. May return null if the database, collection, field, or newValue is null, or if an exception occurs during execution.

      • fetchSortedTopPlayersAsync

        public CompletableFuture<List<org.bson.Document>> fetchSortedTopPlayersAsync(int size)
        Asynchronously fetches a sorted list of top players based on kills.
        Parameters:
        size - The maximum number of top players to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture containing a sorted list of top players' documents based on special kills. The CompletableFuture may complete exceptionally if an error occurs during the operation.

      • getMongoClient

        public com.mongodb.client.MongoClient getMongoClient()
        returns the MongoDB client instance used by the MongoWrapper.
        Returns:
        The MongoDB client instance.

      • close

        public CompletableFuture<Void> close()
        Closes the MongoDB client.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture that completes when the client is closed
